ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'International_Future_Student_Enquiry', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Domestic_Future_Student_Enquiry'), AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Response Given'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Redirected'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Tier 3 Referred'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Agent Referred') ) ), LEN ( Closure_Details__c ) <= 20 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Details of at least 20 characters are required when Status is set to Closed
